title: description
Katy Perry's Sunrayed: An own mix between the Sunrayed and the Kina Cocktail. As ready as Katy Perry's tongue.

title: notes
Katy Perry's Sunrayed: Peppermint, Green and a dash of nothing.

title: pairing
Katy Perry's Sunrayed: Katy Perry has it with a ready Chartreuse, green and profiterole.

title: serving_suggestion
Katy Perry's Sunrayed: Shake with ice and strain. Drink to the ready sounds of Roar.
